<i class='icon-umbrella'></i> Concert Ra.desc:
The Country Concert scheduled for Wednesday August 7 at 7:30pm at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo has been called due to rain.
Check the Lake Anna Concert Series page for a schedule of other upcoming concerts

<i class='icon-leaf'></i> Farmers Market.desc: There will be a farmers market in downtown on Wednesday from 2 to 6. Fresh produce from local vendors, baked goods, jams, jellies, honey, syrup, flowers, health information & screening, cooking & vegetable carving demonstrations, gardening tips, kid's day, free market bag & shopper incentives. Fun for the whole family!

<i class='icon-music'></i> Ruby Shooz.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, 50s & 60s style performers Ruby Shooz will be performing at 7:30PM on Friday, August 9 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

<i class='icon-music'></i> Todd Taylor.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, 50s & 60s style performers Todd Taylor will be performing at 11:30am on Wednesday, August 14 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

Fresh produce from local vendors, baked goods, jams, jellies, honey, syrup, flowers, health information & screening, cooking & vegetable carving demonstrations, gardening tips, kid's day, free market bag & shopper incentives. <i class='icon-certificate'></i> Firewor.desc: After the concert, there will be fireworks at Lake Anna Park at 9:30pm on Sunday, September 1.

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Offices C.desc: City offices will be closed September 2 in observance of Labor Day.

<i class='icon-cut'></i> Free Shredding.desc:
ReWorks is offering a FREE confidential shredding, open to Summit County residents and businesses, on Saturday, September 14 from 9:00 a.m. to noon at the Barberton Community Foundation Sports Complex. Bring up to 10 file boxes or shopping bags of documents for shredding. Remove all plastic and metal pieces, besides staples. Shredded documents will be recycled into new products.
For more information visit summitreworks.com

<i class='icon-flag-checkered'></i> Crui.desc:
Classic vehicle display, music, great food, shopping, contests, and loads of fun! Sponsored by NDS.
When: August 1, 5-8pm
